News.Title: Balaji Phosphates: Decent Market Debut with 7% Premium
News.Summary: Balaji Phosphates listed on NSE SME at ₹75, a 7.14% premium over its IPO price of ₹70. The stock further gained to ₹78, 11.40% above the IPO price. The ₹50.11 crore IPO was subscribed 1.21 times overall. Proceeds will be used for warehouse establishment, facility upgrades, and working capital requirements.
